name: MP Project [Not final title]
description:
Multiplayer Horror game where a group of players try to escape a derelict underground base from an AI-controlled killer. The killer can learn from the survivor's behavior and use their own strategy against them.

Minimum specs (not final):
- Android version 5.1+

Please note that this game is currently under heavy development, so expect a lot of changes. Stay tuned for updates.
